TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EnlistmentOptions extends System.Enum

summary.span: 判斷是否應該在準備階段登記物件。

span.span: Determines whether the object should be enlisted during the prepare phase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別傳遞至和和方法，以告知交易管理員資源管理員是否需要建立另一個登記在準備階段。This enumeration is passed into the and and methods to notify the transaction manager whether the resource manager needs to create another enlistment during the Prepare phase. 如需有關登錄的詳細資訊，請參閱[編列的資源，以在交易中的參與者身分](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bf66ce7-4190-4910-89d7-df4ad43e9f31)。For more information on enlistment, see [Enlisting Resources as Participants in a Transaction](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bf66ce7-4190-4910-89d7-df4ad43e9f31). 如果 EnlistDuringPrepareRequired 登錄期間指定，資源管理員會指出它要接收準備通知，而交易仍然允許使用新的登記。If EnlistDuringPrepareRequired is specified during enlistment, the resource manager indicates that it wants to receive a Prepare notification while new enlistments are still allowed for the transaction. 做為另一個長期的資源，例如後端資料庫的快取的資源管理員可能會使用此選項在登錄期間。A resource manager who acts as a cache for another durable resource, such as a backend database, would probably use this option during enlistment. 當快取的資源取得其準備通知時，它會將其內容傳輸給長期的資源中。When the caching resource gets its Prepare notification, it transfers its content to the durable resource. 如此一來，永久性資源登記交易變成 2 階段認可 (2PC) 通訊協定的參與者。By doing so, the durable resource enlists on the transaction to become a participant of the 2 Phase Commit (2PC) protocol. 發生這種情況之前，已編列只能快取資源 （而非持久資源）。Before this happens, only the caching resource (not the durable resource) was enlisted. 如果未指定，編列表示它將會收到準備通知，直到已經太遲 2PC 中建立新的登記。If None is specified, the enlistment indicates that it will not receive a Prepare notification until it is too late to create new enlistments in 2PC. 在前述案例中，如果快取的資源指定期間登記，此選項，而且嘗試排清其快取，準備通知期間長期的資源時，取得例外狀況嘗試進行登記，因為它已經太遲了。In our preceding scenario, if a caching resource specifies this option during enlistment, and attempts to flush its cache during the Prepare notification, the durable resource gets an exception when it attempts on enlisting since it is too late. 無 」 應該做為預設值使用。None should be used as a default.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions EnlistDuringPrepareRequired = int32(1)

summary.span: 物件必須在認可程序的初始階段登記。

span.span: The object must enlist during the initial phase of the commitment process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions None = int32(0)

summary.span: 在認可程序的初始階段，物件不需要登記。

span.span: The object does not require enlistment during the initial phase of the commitment process.
